answers.answer: High blood pressure can be associated with preeclampsia, especially if you also have protein in your urine.
High blood pressure runs in my family which I didn't know until today. They took a urine sample but I guess they'll call with the results if anything was found?

I get high blood pressure while pregnant. I did with my last pregnancy and now this one. I just have to take a baby aspirin every day and they just watch me more carefully to make sure I don't develop preeclampsia. And I get more ultrasounds to check on the baby!My son was born healthy at 39weeks 5 days! And I'll be getting induced at 39 weeks again :)
You said he a lot lol (: hoping for a boy?
My daughter was like that. They had me empty my bladder and roll over to my side etc and she opened up
That's exciting I cry every time I got to see my baby I can't wait to hold her in may arms
Aw! How exciting. How far along are you?

Lol I was told girls are very lady like and keep thier legs closed. My friend had to pay 250 to get her sex ultrasound and he daughter wouldn't move her legs. Took them 35 mins to see she was a girl. Same with my niece. My sons however were very open with telling us they were boys. Laying with their feet up and spread lol and for every ultrasound. Good luck next time :)
Yes I'm hoping for a boy! Lol. And I'm 22+1. Everyone seems to be wanting a girl but me and my boyfriend. So we'll see! (:

question: And my little monster was not showing his private parts at all! He had his feet crossed and his knees up to his chin haha. So I go back in two weeks to see what I'm having. But finally getting to see my baby was amazing. He opened his eyes and had one arm raised to the top of his head, and he also punched me. Just happy he's doing okay ❤I think I may have high blood pressure though. They checked it twice and it only lowered a little. What are some risks or conditions that could occur for having it when you're pregnant? It has me worried!
title: Finally had a doctors appointment/ultrasound! (:
